preset.name: Azure Serenity
preset.description: A calming, spacious preset inspired by 'blue heaven' for ambient space music featuring a bass instrument.

parameter_reasoning.threshold: Lowered threshold for a more subtle gating effect
parameter_reasoning.attack: Adjusted attack for a smoother transients handling
parameter_reasoning.release: Optimized release for a natural decay

parameter_reasoning.band1_freq: Adjusted frequency for better tonal balance
parameter_reasoning.band2_gain: Reduced gain for a more subtle effect

parameter_reasoning.reduction: Adjusted reduction for a more balanced compression

parameter_reasoning.feedback: Reduced feedback for a more controlled effect

parameter_reasoning.wow: Adjusted wow/flutter for a vintage feel

parameter_reasoning.damp: Adjusted damping for a more balanced reverb
parameter_reasoning.decay: Optimized decay for a natural reverb tail

metadata.signal_chain_analysis: Reordered the signal chain to ensure optimal flow: Noise Gate → Parametric EQ → Vintage Opto Compressor → Stereo Chorus → Tape Echo → Plate Reverb
metadata.parameter_adjustments: Adjusted parameters across all engines to achieve a balanced character and moderate intensity
metadata.musical_reasoning: The refined preset aims to maintain a balanced tonal character with a moderate intensity level, ensuring all effects work harmoniously together while enhancing the overall musical quality.
